name: Red Gingham Neckerchief - Bone Print
description:
Handmade in a lovely red and white gingham, and lined with bright red cotton, this lovely unique neckerchief is hand block printed using an original EdwynUK lino cut.
It is worn by threading the dogs collar through the top.
This holds it firmly in place and means it won't come off in the blackberry bushes! 

Helpfully, the slip through fitting means it allows for larger and smaller adjustments in sizing.

Notes for sizing:
EXTRA SMALL: Puppies, Chihuahua, Shih Tsu, Toy breeds
SMALL: Westie’s, Jack Russels, KC Spaniel, French Bulldog, small Welsh & Lakeland Terriers, Miniature Schnauzers
MEDIUM: Springer & Cocker Spaniels, larger Welsh & Lakeland Terriers, Irish Terriers, Beagles, Schnauzers
LARGE: Airedale, Labrador, German Shepherd, Irish Setter

Approximate Top measurements (where the collar threads through)
XS – 14 cm (5 ½ ”)
S   – 16 cm (6 ½ ”)
M  – 22 cm (8 ½ ”)
L   – 28 cm (11 ”)

If you are not sure about which size to choose, send a message with details of your dogs breed and/or collar measurement and I will happily advise the correct size for your dog.

*Please note the collar is not included.

name: Terrier Head Keyring
description:
This lovely characterful keyring is based on our namesake Welsh Terrier Edwyn.
Hand printed using a original hand carved by EdwynUK lino cut, each keyring is unique and just that little bit different.

Available in choice of our lovely fabrics: the timeless and cheery red gingham, the very popular grey stripe, the classic brown check linen and a natural linen which goes with everything!

The 'head' measures approx 61/2 cm by 6cm (2 1/2" x 2 1/4")

*FREE* postage for United Kingdom customers
